data.title: The Faces of North Hall High School
data.meta_description: Meet Mrs.Gibson. Mrs. Gibson works in the front office of North Hall High School. Her favorite part about her job is getting to know the students because they make her day. Mrs.Gibson’s advice to give people is “Just be nice, you never know when you will see that person again in life.” We would love to thank Mrs. Gibson for her time with us today and for everything, she does for North Hall.
data.meta_site_name: The Faces of North Hall High School
data.text:
Meet Mrs. Gibson. Mrs. Gibson works in the front office of North Hall High School. Her favorite part about her job is getting to know the students because they make her day. Mrs. Gibson’s advice to give people is, “Just be nice, you never know when you will see that person again in life.” We would love to thank Mrs. Gibson for her time with us today and for everything she does for North Hall.

Q: Please tell us a little bit about your family.

A: “I have been married to Tony Gibson for almost 29 years and we have 3 daughters. Hannah, Caroline, and Sarah. Sarah is currently a student at North Hall High School.”

Q: What are a couple of your favorite restaurants in our community?

A: “Kelly’s Tavern and Sweet Magnolia’s”

Q: How long have you lived or worked in our community?

A: “This is my fifth year working at the high school. Other than leaving for college I have lived here my whole life.”

Q: If you could travel anywhere in the world right now, where would it be and why?

A: “Ireland and Scotland. It seems very interesting and I have ancestry dating back there.”

Q: What is one of your favorite movies? TV shows?

A: “Loved Top Gun Maverick – I love all things 80’s so very nostalgic”

Q: What is your favorite thing or something unique about our community? And secondly. What is something you hope our community has or does in the future?

A: “Love how the community cares for each other. I would love to see the campus grow.”

Q: What is something on your bucket list?

A: “ Go to Iceland and swim in the Blue Lagoon and see the Northern Lights.”

Q: What is something you are proud to check off your bucket list?

A: “Going to Hawaii and seeing Pearl Harbor.”

Q: Who inspires you to be better?

A: “My children, every day.”
